group_1.textRight: Who needs to get a life! And who needs @Valentine's Day!
I don't care about any of those things!
I'm not gonna let this day get ruined@by you!
I've been holding off on a whole LOT of@things recently, you know!
So I'll be putting the ethanol away...
[bgEffect:shakeLarge]And loading you with nitroglycerin!@Burn, Witch, burn!
